<!-- installing libraries and dataset -->

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(vdemdata)
vdemfull <- vdemdata::vdem
onlycountries <- vdemfull[-c(25990:27555), ]
```
<!-- womens empowerment variables -->
```{r}
allwemp <- onlycountries %>% select(country = country_name, abbr = country_text_id, id = country_id, year = year, wpei = v2x_gender, liberties = v2x_gencl, society = v2x_gencs, participation = v2x_genpp)
wemp100yr <- filter(allwemp, year > 1899, year < 2001)
```
